messages.greeting: Hello, thank you for calling IOBIC. This is your AI assistant speaking. How may I help you today?
messages.userQuestion1: Hi, I'd like to book a haircut appointment for tomorrow afternoon.
messages.agentResponse1: I'd be happy to help you book a haircut appointment. We have availability at 2:00 PM, 3:30 PM, and 5:00 PM tomorrow. Which time would work best for you?
messages.userQuestion2: 3:30 PM would be perfect. Can I book with hair stylist Maria if she's available?
messages.agentResponse2: Let me check that for you... Yes, Maria is available at 3:30 PM tomorrow. Would you like me to book that appointment for you?
messages.userConfirmation: Yes, please go ahead and book it.
messages.agentConfirmation: Great! I've booked your haircut appointment with Maria for tomorrow at 3:30 PM. You'll receive a confirmation text message shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

features.title: How Our AI Phone Agent Works

feature1.title: 24/7 Call Answering
feature1.description: Never miss a call again. Our AI handles all customer calls at any time of day or night, ensuring you capture every business opportunity.

feature2.title: Smart Appointment Scheduling
feature2.description: The AI agent checks your availability, schedules appointments, and sends confirmation messages to both you and your clients.

feature3.title: Natural Conversations
feature3.description: Our advanced AI understands context and speaks naturally, providing your customers with a seamless and professional experience.

feature4.title: Multilingual Support
feature4.description: Communicate with your customers in Bulgarian, English, and other languages, expanding your business reach.

feature5.title: Call Analytics
feature5.description: Gain insights from your calls with detailed analytics on call volume, peak times, common questions, and customer satisfaction.

feature6.title: Easy Integration
feature6.description: Seamlessly connects with your existing business tools and phone systems - no complex setup required.
